name: Jungle Mystery (EleventhSegment)
description: Jungle Mystery is a 2D platformer. In the game you will face various obstacles, which only the main character can pass. The game is about a tourist who got separated from the group, got lost and accidentally fell into an old abandoned dungeon, during the fall he hurt himself, after that he got a strange feeling, he was able to change his state for a while, in this state he feels stronger, you need to understand what happened and how to get out of this dungeon.
